quest.name: Where Courage Endures
journal: The Roegadyn woman you seek is somewhere in Radiata, and Lyse is eager to find her.
objectives: Search for your contact in Radiata.
Meet with the contact outside Radiata.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I thought they said this was a village? It looks more like a work camp...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Nary a soldier in sight. Mayhap they were recalled to Castrum Abania...

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Perhaps you recall the night we first met outside the Sil'dihn ruins, under such unfortunate circumstances? I had just returned from a meeting with my Ala Mhigan agents. As I said before, we have been preparing for this day.

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text: We have lost so many men already... If we suffer another defeat like that, this campaign is over.

dialogue.name: STORMOFFICER
dialogue.text: We will have our retribution. It is but a matter of time.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Had Alphinaud not volunteered you, I would have asked. If anyone can see this mission through, it's you.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Alphinaud said we were looking for a Roegadyn woman, right? And that we should answer her question with “courage”?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I suppose we'll just have to strike up a conversation with every one of them until we find our contact. Let me know if you find her, and I'll do the same.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Hmm...she has to be around here somewhere...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So as I was saying, about this woman...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Any luck? No? Me neither...

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: ...Ain't seen you around before. Takes a certain kind of womanman to walk into a place like this uninvited.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I will go whither the wild rose blooms.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: One with courage, I suppose.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Times are tough, but so am I.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: See any roses 'round here? 'Cause I don't. Piss off.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: Oh aye? I'll bet you are. Best of luck to you, soldier.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: ...Courage, you say? Well, that's in short supply these days. Better to keep your head down and go along to survive.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: Call me a coward too, if you like, 'cause I'll not speak on it more─at least not here.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: Outside Radiata, behind those barricades over yonder, on the other hand...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Hey. Was that who I think it was?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Well, that's a relief─or a trap. Either way, I'll find Alphinaud and Alisaie. We'll meet you there.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: Not followed, were you? Good.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: That all of you, is it? Let's get to it, then. Name yourselves.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We are the Scions of the Seventh Dawn. Friends of Marshal Tarupin.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: (-Stark Woad-)Name's Stark. Stark Woad. The rest you know, or we wouldn't be here.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: (-Stark Woad-)This is about Specula Imperatoris and the cannon, isn't it?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Just so. Can you tell us what happened?

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: (-Stark Woad-)Aye. I overheard soldiers talking while working in the mess. The ceruleum pipeline fueling the cannon was destroyed by an unidentified male insurgent, they said.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: One man single-handedly disabled the cannon? That beggars belief!

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: (-Stark Woad-)Nevertheless, that's what they said. It took a while, but they've finally put the fires out, and the engineers have been working day and night to repair it.

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: (-Stark Woad-)Wish I could tell you more, but the incident had everyone jumping at shadows and afraid to say much more. To make matters worse, the Ala Mhigan help have been sent home indefinitely.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: So the cannon could already be fully operational...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We need to sneak inside Castrum Abania to ensure the cannon is no longer a threat to our troops. Can you help us?

dialogue.name: STARKWOAD
dialogue.text: (-Stark Woad-)Aye, that much I can do. I've pieced together a map of the interior over the years, and I know for a fact that there are multiple points of entry.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text:
Impressive...
If we split into several groups, that may improve our odds of reaching the fire control center.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We may be few in number, but I have faith that we can see this through!
